author: thepowers (帥肥宅)
title: [爆卦] 以色列攻擊伊朗核設施
content: U.S. officials have confirmed to ABC News that Israeli missiles have hit asite in Iran.3 explosions have been reported in Iran's Isfahan region, home to criticalnuclear facilities recently shut down due to security concerns.Source: Reuters, ABCVideo: Unconfirmed突發事件：美國確認以色列國防軍攻擊伊朗美國官員向美國廣播公司新聞證實，以色列飛彈擊中了伊朗境內的一個地點。據報道，伊朗伊斯法罕地區發生了三起爆炸，該地區的重要核設施最近因安全問題而關閉。來源：路透社、美國廣播公司影片：未經證實
ISRAEL HAS HIT THE NUCLEAR FACILITYRIA Novosti Agency confirms that an Iranian Nuclear Facility has been struck以色列襲擊了核設施俄新社證實伊朗核設施遭到攻擊

Additional Footage showing Anti-Aircraft Fire earlier over the City of Isfahan in Central Iran.其他影片顯示早期伊朗中部伊斯法罕市上空出現防空火力。U.S. Officials have Confirmed that Israeli Aircraft have Stuck a Location inIran.美國官員證實以色列飛機已困在伊朗境內。
I can't find any NOTAMs in Iranian airspace but multiple aircraft arediverting.我在伊朗領空找不到任何航行通告，但多架飛機正在改道。--
